means: 阿谀奉承会/不会使你如愿以偿

sentence.Network_en: John found himself surrounded by insincere flattery.
sentence.Network_cn: 约翰发现自己为虚情假意的奉承阿谀所包围。

sentence.Network_en: He is ambitious and susceptible to flattery.
sentence.Network_cn: 他雄心勃勃，而且很喜欢听别人的恭维话。

sentence.Network_en: You're too intelligent to fall for his flattery.
sentence.Network_cn: 你很聪明，不会受他的阿谀奉承所惑。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语双语故事狐狸和乌鸦_英语网 ... a match for …… 的对手 flattery 奉承 chuckling 暗自得意.
蓝宝GRE笔考词汇突破核心词汇 - 免费文档下载 ... glowing tribute 厚礼 flattery 谄媚 respiration (呼吸).
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... flattening of affect 情感冷漠 flattery 阿谀 flatulence 空虚.
职称英语等级考试A - 原版英语_馆档网 ... flatter 奉承，阿谀，使愉快 flattery 恭维(话) fleet (舰、飞机、汽车等)队.

list.abs: To persuade or attempt to persuade by flattery or guile ; cajole ., 哄骗通过奉承或哄骗说服或试图说服 ; 用甜言蜜哄骗.
To persuade or attempt to persuade by flattery or guile ; cajole ., 哄骗通过奉承或哄骗说服或试图说服 ; 用甜言蜜哄骗.
remember , everyone loves flattery , don't go over the top .记住：每个人都喜欢听好话，但是，别做过头。
she was pleased by the flattery .她听了这些奉承话而得意起来。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French flaterie, from flater 'stroke, flatter', probably of Germanic origin and related to flat

entry.def: Flattery consists of flattering words or behaviour.

example.ex: He is ambitious and susceptible to flattery.
example.tran: 他雄心勃勃，而且很喜欢听别人的恭维话。

auth_sentence.content: Tyranny over his inferiors, and flattery to the queen.
auth_sentence.res_content: Tyranny over his inferiors, and flattery to the queen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tyranny over his inferiors, and flattery to the queen.

auth_sentence.content: Flattery is the attempt at something you fail to possess.
auth_sentence.res_content: Flattery is the attempt at something you fail to possess.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Flattery is the attempt at something you fail to possess.

auth_sentence.content: Thank you for the flattery, however, you are wrong in one part.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thank you for the flattery, however, you are wrong in one part.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thank you for the flattery, however, you are wrong in one part.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"人或小东西",常带有嬉谑性或爱称; 2. 表名词,加在形容词或r结尾的单词后,通常表示为"状态,性质等"; 3. 表形容词,加在名词后,表示"……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: fat肥大的+y人或小东西→fatty胖子
daint+y状态,性质等→n.精美食品 adj.娇美的,挑剔的
craze狂热+y……的→crazy疯狂的
fault犯错误+y……的→adj.有过失的,有缺点的
flint极硬的东西,燧石+y……的→adj.极坚硬的
greed贪欲,贪婪+y……的→adj.贪吃的,贪婪的,渴望的
guilt罪行,内疚+y……的→adj.犯罪的,有罪的,心虚的
hill小山,丘陵+y……的→adj.多小山的;丘陵起伏的
rain雨+y……的→adj.下雨的,多雨的
sleep睡+y……的→adj.想睡的;寂静的
stead=stand站+y……的→adj.稳固的,稳定的
wind风+y……的→adj.多风的,刮风的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 多树木的,木本的,木头般的,木制的
stems_affixes.word_buile: wood木+y……的→adj.多树木的,木本的,木头般的,木制的
dog狗+y人或小东西→doggy小狗
fat肥大的+y人或小东西→fatty胖子
gran奶奶+y人或小东西→granny
kit猫+y人或小东西→kitty小猫
miss小姐,姑娘+y人或小东西→n.少女,小姑娘
old老的+y人或小东西→n.老人,陈旧之物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 矮子,特别短的东西[尤指衣,裤]
stems_affixes.word_buile: short短的+y人或小东西→矮子
batter接连重击+y状态,性质等→殴打
daint+y状态,性质等→n.精美食品 adj.娇美的,挑剔的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 投递,送交;交付,交货;分娩
stems_affixes.word_buile: deliver递送+y状态,性质等→投递,送交
difficult困难的+y状态,性质等→n.困难,困境,难题
discover发现,发觉+y状态,性质等→n.发现;被发现的事物
flatter阿谀,奉承+y状态,性质等→n.谄媚,阿谀,巴结,奉承
harmon+y状态,性质等→n.协调,融洽
inquire打听,询问+y状态,性质等→n.[enquiry]询问,打听,调查
jealous嫉妒的+y状态,性质等→n.妒忌,嫉妒,猜忌

stems_affixes.value_cn: 控制权,统治权;精通,掌握
stems_affixes.word_buile: master掌握+y状态,性质等→n.控制权,统治权;精通,掌握
recover恢复,痊愈+y状态,性质等→n.恢复,痊愈,防御

sentences.en: I was really pleased when he said how well I’d done,because he isn’t known for flattery.
sentences.cn: 听他说我做得这么好时,我很高兴,因为他不是擅长恭维的人。

sentences.en: Men are often reached by flattery.
sentences.cn: 人常常因受到恭维而动心。

means.word_mean: 阿谀奉承会/不会使你如愿以偿

sentences.en: Just remember—flattery will get you nowhere. There’s no use trying to be nice to me so I’ll give you what you want.
sentences.cn: 记住—拍马屁不会使你如愿以偿。你讨好我也没用，我不会给你想要的东西。
